timeline.message:
- Add test for sequencing.
- Also sequence multiple operations to the same id as the originating request.

timeline.author: bratseth

replies.bodyText: No, you shall only continue on the original path if there is exactly one operation with the same id as the incoming operation. If there are multiple operations with the same id they must always be sequenced. If they are to the original id or not does not matter.
replies.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: The if is actually the normal path :)
replies.author: baldersheim
